sec.title: Author contributions
sec.p: X. L., Z. Q. and F. H. designed the experiments and wrote the manuscript. K. L., Y. L. and T. P. collected plant materials, and X. L., F. H., X. L., Z. L. and G. D. performed the experiments and data analysis. Z. Q. improved the English of the paper.
